long_description: The Jansport Agave daypack carries everything you need for school, work or the gym. A versatile padded sleeve fits a 15 in. laptop or a 3-liter hydration system. Dual main compartments allow you to separate and organize gear, folders and books; built-in padded sleeve fits laptop computer or hydration reservoir (sold separately). Front utility pocket keeps loose items organized and easy access to your essentials; handy quick-access top loft pocket. Side mesh water bottle pockets. Perforated foam shoulder straps provide lightweight, breathable support; fully padded back panel protects your body from the pack's contents. Webbing haul handle makes off-back carrying easy on the hands; tuck away the webbing waistbelt when you don't need it. Side compression straps compress load for easier carrying; daisy chain loops let you lash on gear. Jansport Agave daypack carries textbooks, laptop, paperbacks, spiral notebooks, calculator, pens and pencils, bag lunch, phone and music player and a sweatshirt.
short_description: The Jansport Agave daypack carries everything you need for school, work or the gym. A versatile padded sleeve fits a 15 in. laptop or a 3-liter hydration system.
